ctu_text: **Maulana Azad National Scholarship:** This scholarship is available for students belonging to the minority communities and pursuing horticulture studies at the undergraduate or postgraduate level. The scholarship covers the tuition fee, maintenance allowance, and other incidental expenses. 1. **Financial Assistance to Poor Students:** The Department of Horticulture also provides financial assistance to poor students who are pursuing horticulture studies but are unable to pay their tuition fees or other expenses.
